Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.main_package

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Calibration
    This class is useful for the robot to calibrate its wheel radius and its track.
    Color
    This class is used to store the values for each colored block sample normal distributions, mean and standard deviation.
    Display
    This class is used to display the content of the odometer variables (x, y, Theta).
    LightPoller
    This class handles the data collected by the light sensor used for localization and odometry correction.
    LightPollerColor
    This class uses a probabilistic model to detect the right colored blocks.
    Main
    Main class, meant to conduct the entire run and manage all the different threads.
    MotorControl
    This class handles all of the motor control.
    myUSPoller
    This class handles the data received by the Ultrasonic Sensor for localization.
    Navigation
    This class is used for the robot's navigation in a grid.
    Parameter_intake
    This Class takes in the parameters for the game with wifi.
    Waypoint
    This class is experimental for now.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Main.List_of_states
